dialogue.htmlContent: As you travel down the gloomy, twisting tunnels of Submission, the sounds of dripping water and slowly-creaking pipes echo off the stone walls to either side of you. Due to this continuous background noise, the quiet splashing of a slime's footsteps as [npc.she] sneaks up on you are all but completely concealed. It isn't until the slime is within ten metres that you suddenly become aware of their presence, and you quickly spin around to find yourself looking at [npc.a_fullRace(true)]!

[npc.speech(Haha! Did I make you jump?)] [npc.She] laughs, continuing to advance on you. [npc.Her] [npc.skinColour] body shakes and ripples a little from [npc.her] joyous outburst, and [npc.she] bites [npc.her] lip as [npc.she] eyes you up and down. [npc.speech(Mmm! You're lookin' good to go already!)]

[npc.Name] suddenly stops, before placing [npc.her] hands on [npc.her] [npc.hips+]. Despite [npc.her] suspicious behaviour, it doesn't look like [npc.she] wants to attack you, and as [npc.she] speaks once more, this is indeed revealed to be the case. [npc.speech(Don't worry, I'm not looking for a fight or anything! I'm just out here on the Queen's orders. Gotta transform as many travellers as I can find into slimes and all that!)]

[pc.speech(I see.)] You reply, allowing yourself to relax a little as you realise that you aren't going to be forced into a fight.

[npc.speech(So, you wanna have sex, or what?)] [npc.Name] suddenly asks. [npc.speech(I usually only fuck people right after I've turned them into slimes, but it's been hours since the last one, and I'm kind of horny.)]

You wonder if you should accept [npc.name]'s invitation, or decline and continue on your way...

[npc.speech(Well, you stay safe out there.)] [npc.Name] says, before turning to leave. [npc.speech(I've gotta find more people to turn into slimes. The Queen said we're supposed to do at least five a day, and I'm only on three so far!)]

You wonder if you should try to put a stop to [npc.name]'s plan, or take your leave and continue on your way...

You don't really want to have sex with [npc.name] right now, and tell [npc.herHim] as such. [pc.speech(I'm not interested. I need to get going now, goodbye.)]

[npc.speech(Well, whatever.)] [npc.Name] says, before turning and making [npc.her] exit. Having dealt with [npc.name], you similarly turn around and continue on your way.
You don't really want to fight [npc.name], so simply say goodbye, before turning around and continuing on your way.

[npc.speech(Haha! Did I make you jump?)] [npc.She] laughs, continuing to advance on you. [npc.Her] [npc.skinColour] body shakes and ripples a little from [npc.her] joyous outburst, and [npc.she] bites [npc.her] lip as [npc.she] eyes you up and down. [npc.speech(Mmm! You're gonna make a great slime, I can tell already!)]

[npc.Name] suddenly stops, before placing [npc.her] hands on [npc.her] [npc.hips+] and grinning evilly at you. [npc.speech(Now, I'm not interested in your money, or anything you have to say! The Queen's ordered me to transform at least five people into slimes every day, and you're lucky number four!)]

[pc.speech(What kind of Queen is ordering people to be transformed into slimes?)] You ask, stepping back and preparing yourself for a fight.

[npc.speech(Well, duh! The slime Queen of course! Perhaps once I've turned you into a new subject of hers, you'll get to meet her some day!)] [npc.Name] grins, before offering you an ultimatum. [npc.speech(Now, we can do this the easy way, or the hard way!)]

You instinctively crouch down a little as you prepare to defend yourself. Then again, you could always do things the 'easy way', and willing let [npc.name] transform you into a slime...

[npc.speech(Haha! Did I make you jump?)] [npc.She] laughs, continuing to advance on you. [npc.Her] [npc.skinColour] body shakes and ripples a little from [npc.her] joyous outburst, and [npc.she] bites [npc.her] lip as [npc.she] eyes you up and down. [npc.speech(Mmm! Yeah, you'll do nicely!)]

[pc.speech(What do you want?)] You ask in a stern tone, instinctively crouching down a little as you prepare to defend yourself.

[npc.speech(How about you start by handing over your cash. There's no need for this to turn ugly.)] [npc.Name] grins, obviously willing to fight you...

#IF npc.isVisiblyPregnant #THEN [npc.speech(Haha! It's you again! Look, I'm still carrying our kids around!)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Haha! It's you again!)] #ENDIF The familiar [npc.race] laughs, continuing to advance on you. [npc.Her] [npc.skinColour] body shakes and ripples a little from [npc.her] joyous outburst, and [npc.she] bites [npc.her] lip as [npc.she] eyes you up and down. [npc.speech(So, you gonna hand over your cash, or what?)]

You instinctively crouch down a little as you prepare to defend yourself. Just like last time, [npc.name] is obviously willing to fight you, and you wonder what you should do next...

[npc.speech(Haha! It's you again! Look here, you've gone and got me knocked up!)] The familiar [npc.race] laughs, rubbing the noticeably swollen bump in [npc.her] belly. [npc.Her] [npc.skinColour] body shakes and ripples a little from [npc.her] joyous outburst, and [npc.she] bites [npc.her] lip as [npc.she] eyes you up and down. [npc.speech(So, you gonna take responsibility, or what? Come on, I need the extra cash for our kid's clothes and stuff!)]

You instinctively crouch down a little as you prepare to defend yourself. Just like last time, [npc.name] is obviously willing to fight you, and you wonder what you should do next...

Wanting to avoid a fight if at all possible, you take a step backwards, fumbling about to grab a handful of flames to offer to [npc.name]. [pc.speech(I don't want to fight! Please, just take this and leave!)]

[npc.speech(Sure thing, it's a lot easier for me if I don't have to pummel you into the ground first!)] [npc.Name] replies, [npc.her] desire to rob you of your money obviously being the motivating factor behind [npc.her] assault.

Stepping forwards, [npc.she] snatches the flames out of your [pc.hand], letting out a mocking laugh as [npc.she] commands, [npc.speech(Hah! Now get out of my sight!)]

Reluctant to do anything other than what [npc.she] suggests, you hurry on your way, thankful that you had enough money to avoid a fight.

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and step forwards smiling seductively at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, all you had to do was ask...)]

[npc.speech(Oh really?)] [npc.name] replies, stepping forwards in an intimidating manner. You remain in place, putting on your most seductive look and trying to make yourself as small as possible as you attempt to entice [npc.name] into using you for some sexual relief.

Much to your delight, your would-be attacker reaches up and grabs you by the [pc.arms], before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace. Pressing [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, [npc.she] thrusts [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth, aggressively kissing you for a moment before pulling back, growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [pc.girl] now, aren't you bitch?)]

Whimpering in the affirmative, you surrender yourself to [npc.name]'s dominant touch, allowing yourself to be used as payment for trespassing on [npc.her] territory...
End sex.
[npc.Name] is not satisfied.
Repeat encounter with [npc.name].
Repeat encounter with [npc.name], where [npc.she] reveals that you've got [npc.herHim] pregnant.
Repeat encounter with [npc.name].
Repeat encounter with [npc.name], where [npc.she] reveals that you've got [npc.herHim] pregnant.
[npc.Name] offers sex.
[npc.Name] tells you to stay safe.
You start sex with [npc.name] as the dominant partner.
[npc.Name] is satisfied.
[npc.Name] is not satisfied.
You start sex with [npc.name] as the submissive partner.
[npc.Name] is satisfied.
[npc.Name] is not satisfied.
[npc.Name] transforms you into a slime.
